description: Enable AI assistants to interact seamlessly with your Contentstack CMS by accessing and managing content types, entries, assets, and global fields through a standardized protocol. Perform CRUD operations and content publishing directly via AI-driven commands to streamline content management workflows. Enhance your content operations with AI-powered automation and real-time content manipulation capabilities.

capabilities.name: create_content_type
capabilities.description: Creates a new content type with the specified schema, options, field rules, and taxonomies.

capabilities.name: update_content_type
capabilities.description: Updates an existing content type identified by its UID. Allows modification of title, schema, options, and field rules.

capabilities.name: delete_content_type
capabilities.description: Deletes a content type identified by its UID.

capabilities.name: create_entry
capabilities.description: Creates a new entry for a specified content type.

capabilities.name: update_entry
capabilities.description: Updates an existing entry identified by its UID and content type UID.

capabilities.name: delete_entry
capabilities.description: Deletes an entry identified by its UID and content type UID.

capabilities.name: get_content_type
capabilities.description: Retrieves a specific content type by its UID, optionally including the global field schema.

capabilities.name: get_all_content_types
capabilities.description: Retrieves a list of all content types, with options for pagination and including additional details like global field schema and counts.

capabilities.name: get_entry
capabilities.description: Retrieves a specific entry by its content type UID and entry UID, with options for locale and including references.

capabilities.name: get_entries
capabilities.description: Retrieves entries for a specified content type, with extensive options for filtering, sorting, pagination, and including related data.

capabilities.name: publish_entry
capabilities.description: Publishes an entry to a specified environment and locale.

capabilities.name: unpublish_entry
capabilities.description: Unpublishes an entry from a specified environment and locale.

capabilities.name: create_global_field
capabilities.description: Creates a new global field with the specified title, UID, and schema.

capabilities.name: update_global_field
capabilities.description: Updates an existing global field identified by its UID. Allows modification of title and schema.

capabilities.name: get_all_global_fields
capabilities.description: Retrieves a list of all global fields, with options for pagination and including branch information.
